description:
Amendements to existing consent Ref: 98/1241 dated 13th April 1999, amendments as follows: 

 1)  revised elevational treatment to Colebrooke Place     facade (different materials); 2)  erection  of air conditioning plant enclosure at     roof level; 3)  alterations from brickwork to glass to lightwell at     second floor level. Applicants Plan Nos:  1683/SK/201, 1/107A, 8/110A,                       1683A/P/101, 100
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
